channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Trump administration rule bars student loan relief for public workers tied to ‘illegal’ activity
item.description: The Trump administration is forging ahead with plans to eject some nonprofits from a popular student loan forgiveness program if their work is deemed to have an “illegal purpose.”

item.title: Judge to consider demand to force the government to keep funding SNAP food aid despite the shutdown
Erika Kirk’s words spotlight forgiveness in a divided nation
